FILE: cm540552v11.0.txt
DYAD: ANGOLA - ZIMBABWE
RIVALRY: RIV1148
DISPUTE(S): MID3002 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180730
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20181005

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID3002 

TERRMID: MID3002 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID3002 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID3002 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID3002 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID3002 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID3002 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID3002 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID3002 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID3002 1 -- civil war MID
CIVWARMID-CER: MID3002 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID3002 from Gibler 2018, in 1979 Rhodesia was facing militarized rebels and bombed a rebel camp in Angola, triggering this MID. Angola openly supported the rebels. Coded civil war MID because this was connected to militarized rebel activity within this dyad. 

CIVWARLINK: MID3002 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID3002 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID3002 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID3002 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID3002 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID3002 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:
Rhodesian military aircraft attacked rebel targets near Vila de Boma, Angola on February 26, 1979, resulting in the deaths of some 200 individuals.

SOURCES-CM:

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
